main event: A civilian observed a white light split into two objects over Casa Grande, Arizona in August 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 7 seconds., The objects were initially seen as one white light which then divided into two objects., The objects were approximately 1/4 inch in size and appeared to climb rapidly after splitting., The witness described a rolling thunder sound associated with the objects., The observer is a 56-year-old civilian, involved with the Chamber of Commerce and considered a reliable individual.
sighted object: one white light that split into two objects
witness description: civilian male, age 56, member of the Chamber of Commerce and Civil Air Patrol
